heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesPageSubtitle: A team dedicated to your transformation. With deep respect for ancestral traditions and a commitment to your well-being, our guides create a safe and loving space for your healing journey.
footerText: © {{year}} El Arte de Sanar. All rights reserved.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You have successfully signed in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully signed in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to start your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully created. Please check your email to verify your account.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please check your new email address for a verification link.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Find the perfect experience for your journey of discovery.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to this ceremony's details.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
deleteCeremonyConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this ceremony?
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony data.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. You can still edit it later.
ceremonyMovedToPast: It will now appear in the past events section.
errorFinishingCeremony: Failed to mark ceremony as finished.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral medicine from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, it has been used by indigenous peoples for healing, spiritual connection, and self-knowledge.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The medicine works on a physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual level, facilitating a deep cleansing process. It allows access to expanded states of consciousness, where it is possible to understand and release emotional blockages, heal past traumas, and gain clarity about one's life purpose.
spiritualMasterDescription: Ayahuasca is considered a master plant that teaches, guides, and shows the way to a fuller and more authentic life. It is not a recreational substance, but a sacred tool for those seeking a genuine transformation.
benefitClarityDescription: It helps to release limiting beliefs and negative thought patterns, bringing a sense of peace and mental clarity.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps to release limiting beliefs and negative thought patterns, bringing a sense of peace and mental clarity.
benefitHealingDescription: It allows confronting and healing deep wounds, past traumas, and unresolved emotions in a safe and loving environment.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It allows confronting and healing deep wounds, past traumas, and unresolved emotions in a safe and loving environment.
benefitConnectionDescription: It fosters a deep connection with oneself, with others, and with the universe, often revealing or reaffirming one's life purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It fosters a deep connection with oneself, with others, and with the universe, often revealing or reaffirming one's life purpose.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a space of trust and community, where the collective energy enhances the individual healing process. Ideal for those who feel comfortable sharing their journey.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and fully personalized experience, designed for those seeking a more focused and deep inner work, with the exclusive dedication of the guides.
editGuideDescription: Update the information for this guide.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the guide's profile.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and transformative power of the sacred plant.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced team that will accompany you on your healing journey.
preparationCtaDescription: Find all the necessary information to prepare for your ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our networks to be part of our community and stay informed about our next events.

selectNewVideo: Or select a new video to upload
errorSelectVideoOrUrl: Please provide a video URL or select a file to upload.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.

noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will hide the ceremony from the public list, but you can reactivate it later.
userManagementSubtitle: Manage users, send communications, and view analytics.
allUsersDescription: View and manage all users of the platform.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review of the user's confidential medical and personal information.
noAnswersSubmitted: No questionnaire has been submitted by this user yet.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants, anxiolytics, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications and dosages.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of psychiatric conditions (schizophrenia, bipolarity, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: I am looking for emotional healing, spiritual connection, overcoming a specific fear...
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be reviewed by the facilitation team.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your answers have been saved. You can review them here at any time.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your questionnaire. Please try again.
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered 'yes'.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have successfully completed the initial questionnaire. The next step is to carefully review the preparation guide to get ready for your experience.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am the spiritual guide from El Arte de Sanar. How can I help you on your path today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
adminPanelSubtitle: Welcome to the control center of El Arte de Sanar.
invitationTabDescription: Manage the WhatsApp message templates used to invite users to complete the questionnaire.
newTemplateMessageES: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: [LINK]
newTemplateMessageEN: Hello! We invite you to complete the medical questionnaire to continue your reservation process at El Arte de Sanar. You can do it here: [LINK]
selectInvitationTemplateDescription: Choose a message to send to {{name}} via WhatsApp.
invitationSent: WhatsApp opened with the pre-filled message.
analyticsDescription: View click counts for different sections of the website.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data. This action cannot be undone.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counts for this ceremony to zero.
exportDataDescription: Download a full backup of all your Firestore data (ceremonies, users, content, etc.) as a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore data from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite existing data.
importWarningDescription: This action will overwrite your current data with the contents of the backup file. A backup of the current state will be automatically created before importing.
importSuccessDescription: Data has been restored from the backup file.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can roll back to the state before that import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to roll back to the state before the last import? This will overwrite your current data.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been reverted to the state before the last import.
themeCustomizationDescription: Adjust the colors for light and dark modes. Changes are previewed live.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review conversations with the spiritual guide AI.
allConversationsDescription: Browse through the complete history of user chats.
noConversationsFound: No conversations have been recorded yet.
systemLogsDescription: Review errors caught by the system.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the recorded error.
preparationPageTitle: The Journey of Transformation: Your Guide to Preparation
preparationProcessDescription: Weeks before, you begin a special diet and mental preparation.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A guided space for introspection, healing, and connection.
experienceProcessDescription: Each journey is unique, bringing revelations and deep cleansing.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we help you apply the lessons in your daily life.
dietTitle: The Dieta: Nourishing Body and Soul
dietSubtitle: The preparation diet is crucial to purify the body and open the spirit to the medicine's teachings.
allowedFoodsList: Grains like quinoa, rice, and oats
Lean meats like chicken or fish (cooked simply)
Herbal teas and plenty of water
prohibitedFoodsTitle: Foods to Avoid (at least 1-2 weeks prior)
mentalPrepSubtitle: A calm and open mind is the best vessel for this journey.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and connect with your inner self.
intentionsDescription: Clearly reflect on what you seek: healing, clarity, purpose? Write it down.
reflectionDescription: Write about your fears, hopes, and expectations before the ceremony.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can bring up deep emotions. It is a safe space to confront and release what no longer serves you. Trust the process, the medicine, and the guides. We are here to support you with love and without judgment through every step of your healing.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare your essentials for a comfortable and focused experience.
comfortItemsList: Comfortable, layered clothing (white or light colors preferred)
A pillow or cushion for sitting
essentialsList: A flashlight (with red light if possible)
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to prepare for your transformative experience.
preparationCompleteDescription: You have reviewed all the necessary steps. You are now more prepared for your journey. Remember to continue with the diet and mental preparation until the day of the ceremony.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit.
